Well, I'm starting on an irritated note because I had a nice speech 
typed out and when I clicked send it logged me out and I lost the 
whole damn thing. *recomposes himself*

Anyway.

The restart will happen tomorrow. Megatron will be RPed my me, and 
Jonathan will be covering the Maximal leader, whom he hasn't decided 
on yet. The Maximal base is going to be located to the right of the 
Rockies, just above the US/Canada border (it didn't crash into the 
mountain, beside it). The Predacon base is going to be located in 
mideastern South America. Anyone having problems with the base 
location can email me, adn we'll see what we can do.

TF:TM ROCKS, G1 ROCKS, G2 ROCKS. I liked BW for how well the CG was 
considering how little money they had (for the most part). =)

I'm going to move everyone's characters into a temp folder, then 
create new folders for everyone. If you have chars created already, 
I suggest you copy them out of there soon. Unless you feel like 
rewriting them again. I figure that that is the best way to clean it 
all up. Although it's still going to take a while, better than 
moving each character's file individually. I'll update the rules 
page sometime in the next week or so (hopefully).

Last thing for now, Dewboy suggested that we add something onto the 
name as we are restarting, and it will be slightly different from 
the original. It'll be in this form:

NBWPRG:<enter suggestion>

So email me your suggestions, then we can have a vote or something 
on the name that most like.
